docs.snippet: A headline on Monday on a capsule summary for an  article  about Michigan’s 79-59 victory over Florida to advance to the Final Four of the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament misstated Michigan’s nickname in some editions. As...
docs.lead_paragraph: A headline on Monday on a capsule summary for an article about Michigan’s 79-59 victory over Florida to advance to the Final Four of the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament misstated Michigan’s nickname in some editions. As the article correctly noted, Michigan teams are called the Wolverines — not the Spartans, the mascot for Michigan State.

docs.snippet: An  article  in some editions on Friday about Ohio State’s 73-70 victory over Arizona in the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament misstated, in some editions, the surname of the player who carried Ohio State’s first-half scori...
docs.lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Friday about Ohio State’s 73-70 victory over Arizona in the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament misstated, in some editions, the surname of the player who carried Ohio State’s first-half scoring. He is Deshaun Thomas, not Edwards. The article also misstated the day of the game in some copies. It was Thursday, not Saturday.

docs.snippet: Corrections appearing in print on April 2, 2013....
docs.lead_paragraph: Corrections appearing in print on April 2, 2013.

docs.snippet: “The Walking Dead,” “The Bible” and “Game of Thrones” all registered impressive ratings on Sunday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: “The Walking Dead,” “The Bible” and “Game of Thrones” all registered impressive ratings on Sunday night.
docs.abstract: Season finales of The Walking Dead on AMC and The Bible on History Channel, as well as season premiere of HBO's Game of Thrones, are broadcast on same night and all post big ratings.

headline.seo: Cable TV Dramas Post Big Sunday Ratings
headline.main: Cable Dramas Post Big Sunday Ratings
headline.print_headline: Cable Dramas Post Big Sunday Ratings
